author: Press
title: England Airport Transfers Holiday Season Rates
text: (MENAFN Press) (MENAFN - MENAFN Press) image01 Sept. 29 2015 - PRLog -- England has numerous airports and uncountable people flying to or from England every day. With the increase of people travelling at odd hours for their flights the industry of airport transfer service is providing people luxurious service in transferring people from and to the airport. Eatransfer have some exciting announcements for all our customers. We understand as the holiday season is just around the corner we wanted to make it special for you and your family. We have drafted new rates for our services which will surely benefit you in catching those odd hour flights to a nice vacation or back to your home for Christmas.London Heathrow Airport to SE1 - Central London price start from 42.00!Our new rate chart is providing heavy discounts for the citizens residing in SE1 areas like south bank Bermondsey and central London areas. If you are living in these areas or planning to fly for a vacation then consider this holiday season rate for your next airport transfers. Our services are as good as they were before but now they are available at even cheaper rate!London Heathrow Airport to Southampton Cruise Port price start from 110.00!This is for the people who are planning a big during this holiday season. Use our comfortable services from Heathrow to Southampton just in 110.00! We are providing you with the same old luxurious service and our 24 hour support is still up and running. So travel with us this season and save a lot of money!London Heathrow Airport to Southampton Cruise Port price for MPV-8 PASSENGERS 145.00We have something special for everyone so if you are travelling in a big group here is an astonishing offer. Use our service for airport transfer and avail a MPV-8 Passenger from Heathrow to Southampton just for 145 pounds! This holiday season make the best trip you can and we would provide you with the best transfer service in England at dirt cheap prices.Book Now for Christmas Holidays to avoid the availability shortage!These are some of the cheapest deals you can find at any transfer service so book your dates with us now! Everybody loves vacations and travelling especially when you have a long break from work school and college. Just pack your bags and let us take you to the airport in our ostentatious vehicles!About England Airport Transfers:England airport Transfer is an East London based company which provides airport transfer and transportation services. We provide the most opulent vehicles at affordable prices. Our 24 hours support and 7 days a week service is for the convenience of our customers. We provide fixed rates and no hidden or extra charges which makes the most efficient and affordable transfer service in UK.http://www.eatransfer.com/ ContactEngland Airport Transfer0044 208 472 4379***eatransfer.com--- End ---
